segments.text: Good coming ! Welcome to J P Interior Design .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hi , I saw the sign outside says that you do all kinds of interior design .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , we do . Do you have any specific needs ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I am thinking about redesigning my kitchen .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you prefer some specific style ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I prefer a more contemporary design .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What kind of color tones do you like ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Blue , green or earth tone colors . I do not like the colors that are too bright .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see . And what kind of feeling do you want to create for your kitchen ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'd like it to look simple , neat and relaxing .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Fine , we will take an actual look at your kitchen before start working on it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No problem . How about 10 ' o clock this Sunday morning ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Okay . Would you please leave your address and phone number ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course . This is my card . See you then .
segments.speaker: S2
